# async_structured_stream

Interfaces for asynchronous streaming structured responses from LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/async_structured_stream/index" symbolName="AsyncIterator" /> AsyncIterator

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/async_structured_stream/index" symbolName="Dataclass" /> Dataclass

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/async_structured_stream/index" symbolName="StreamChunk" /> StreamChunk

A chunk of a streaming response from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="responses/async_structured_stream/index" symbolName="AsyncStructuredStream" /> AsyncStructuredStream

An asynchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM.
